name: sort_live_giveaways
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gamerpower.
Tool description: Find all free games, loot and giveaways with this giveaway tracker API powered by GamerPower.com! Access programmatically the best giveaways in gaming!
API description: Fetches and sorts live giveaways from the GamerPower API based on a given criterion.

sort_by.description: The criterion by which to sort the giveaways. Options might include 'date', 'value', or 'popularity'. Default is 'value'.
